attributes.action: Force Premier League to remove Pay per view whilst we are in a pandemic.
attributes.additional_details:
I think politically it would be a very strong message to be sent to the people who run the game.
It would get a lot of backing in the UK I am sure. 
Football without fans is nothing.
attributes.background:
Challenge the Premier League, Sky and BT over their greed and contempt of the British Public at a time when everyone should be pulling together
Guilting already upset and skint football fans who can’t watch their beloved teams.
Marcus Rashford puts them to shame.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the organisers.

We also cannot accept petitions that call for an action relating to a particular individual, or organisation outside of the UK Government or Parliament.
